Title: Ougon Yuusha Goldran
Description:
['Goldran follows the adventures of three young boys who are tasked with finding alien robot fighters, or Braves, that are sleeping in the form of crystals. Their major antagonist is the flamboyant and thoroughly incompetent Walter, and the villains that follow him are often similarly humorous. ', '
', '
', '
', '
(Source: Wikipedia)']
Characters: ['Walzac, Walter', 'Suganuma, Dai', 'Dran', 'Tokimura, Kazuki', 'Harashima, Takuya', 'Walzac, Serious', 'Michiru-sensei', "Serious's subordinate", 'Captain Shark', 'King of Sodora']
Voices: ['Morikawa, Toshiyuki', 'Okano, Kousuke', 'Narita, Ken', 'Morita, Kiyu', 'Minami, Omi', 'Sadaoka, Sayuri', 'Asami, Junko', 'Itou, Kentarou', 'Yamanoi, Jin', 'Genda, Tesshou']
